type.description: The motion type of this physics body as a string.

mass.description: The mass of this physics body in kilograms.

linearVelocity.description: The initial linear velocity of the body in meters per second.

angularVelocity.description: The initial angular velocity of the body in radians per second.

inertiaDiagonal.description: The inertia around principle axes in kilogram meter squared. If zero or not specified, the inertia should be calculated automatically.

inertiaOrientation.description: The inertia orientation as a Quaternion. If not specified, the inertia is not rotated.
